text: Studio X Sessions EP (2004) is an EP by Death Cab for Cutie. It was released exclusively on Apple's iTunes Music Store website. ==Track listing== The E.P. consists of new versions of four songs that had all been recorded and released previously: A new version of the Death Cab for Cutie song "Lightness" was also recorded during these sessions, and it was released on "The Sound of Settling" CD-single. Category:2004 EPs Category:Death Cab for Cutie albums
title: Studio X Sessions EP
